trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Vincennes
There were no other sightings in Vincennes on or around November 11th 2009
Summary: Silent 3 orbed craft in triangle formation flew overhead.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was winter time and a crystal clear night. I had let my dogs outside to use the bathroom and was star gazing. I witnessed something that flew directly above me that had 3 soft blue or grayish orbs in the shape of a triangle. It was at very, very low altitude, <= 400', cruising about the speed of a small single engine plane. It made NO sound whatsoever, and was veering right, at a curve. It was a very very quiet night, and I live in town, at the time there were no cars out and it was pretty much silent and cold. When it passed me overhead, it appeared that the orbs made a circle and twisted around each other one time. Then it almost immediately dimmed until I couldn't see it anymore. It was definitely a singular craft of some sort, not 3 individual objects. The whole event lasted 6 seconds at the most. My reaction was one of fear. I had a sense of static or being watched. I ran inside and locked my door in fact.
